text:
@HillaryClinton African Americans are more susceptible to the CORONAVIRUS 
because they have a VITAMIN D DEFICIENCY.
The Melanin in their skin blocks out
the Sun and Vitamin D production. 
They need to take a Vitamin D 
supplement.
